column4: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=202605 <-- i'm trying to follow this guide to set up a home network between my laptop and a windows machine. however, the two machines are on the same router so they share the same IP address. is that a problem? also, will this configuration share things through the router (local intranet) instead of the internet? the purpose of this connection is supposed to be to send files between the two machines without using up
our bandwidth (we have a bandwidth cap) so it needs to go over the router...
local network traffic stays local so doesnt add
